name: admonishing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
intended to tell someone that they have done something wrong: He waggled an admonishing finger in my direction but didn't say anything. The manager offers admonishing words one minute, and a fatherly arm around the player's shoulder the next.
More examplesFewer examplesThe boys withered under the police officer's admonishing glare.She can seem severe at times, like an admonishing head teacher.He adopted the voice of an admonishing parent.She wore a wide smile but there was no disguising the admonishing tone of her voice.
